Once inside, Sam pulled off her shirt and looked in the mirror to see a tiny figure resting on her shoulder. She looked more closely to see that it was none other than her friend, Clover! After putting her in the palm of her hand, she spoke.

"I don't know, I used that machine that Alex ordered to get rid of that zit on my nose, and now I'm like this! Looks like it's a shrinking ray too!"
"Well I'm glad I didn't use it to get rid of all this fat!" Sam said as she pointed to the visible fat below her bra-covered breasts. "Now I wonder how we're gonna get you back to normal!"
"Yeah, I don't wanna be the reason we don't get to go to the mall later today!"

112121.content:
"Alright, I can study later, but for now we need to get back to your house so that you can see the world from a human perspective again!" Sam put Clover in her purse pocket, slid her shirt back on, then left the bathroom and then the library it was contained in.
They had a smooth ride home. However, they realized quickly that they were locked out because Sam forgot to grab one of Clover's spare house keys!
"Dammit, I can't believe I didn't remember! What are we gonna do now?"
Luckily for them, Alex returned from her morning run just then and headed toward the front door, noticing Sam in the process.
"Hi Sam, where are you headed off to?"
"Ummmm....agh, there's no point in hiding it. Clover tried to use that shrink ray of yours to clear out that awful pimple of hers. It worked, but now she's ant-sized! I went to the library and found her on my shoulder there, and now we can't get in!" she carefully pulled Clover out of her purse and set her in the palm of her hand.
"I had no idea it would do this! I'm so sorry! Here, I'll get us in your house so we can make her normal again."
Alex pulled out one of Clover's house keys from her joggers and unlocked the door, and the three girls stepped in and went to Clover's room, where the machine was located. She tried to work it again. "There has to be some sort of reverse option here-AHA! Here it is!" She turned the knob so that it pointed to "undo" as Sam set Clover down in front of it. "Ready?"
"Yeah!"
"And...fire!" Alex pushed the activation button, which, after a few seconds of charging, shot out a dim red laser at Clover. She started to grow again, but her clothes didn't want to grow with her. Her white bra snapped apart and fell off first, then her matching panties tore, and her shirt ripped while her shorts came apart at the seams. After about 30 seconds, she was fully grown, but also fully exposed. To make matters worse, the zit came back as well.
Clover immediately looked down at her negative size clothes on the floor and quickly noticed her naked state; she covered up as Alex looked back at her.
"Yay, it worked! Glad to have you back again! Especially cause it's just you!"
"What the...I'M NAKED!!!" Sam stopped herself from laughing and sprinted to the bathroom; she came back with Clover's red and yellow bathrobe and tossed it to her. Fifteen seconds later she sat down on her bed, relieved to be covered again.
"That was...so embarrassing! I can't believe my clothes didn't grow with me, yet they still shrunk when I did!"
"You might wanna be more concerned about that pimple on your head." Sam remarked.
"WHAT?!" Clover darted to the bathroom to see that the pimple hadn't disappeared. "NO! The machine didn't work at all!" She came back into her room, her B cups bouncing.
"Relax, Clover. In fact, I just realized something: that isn't anything to worry about at all! We shouldn't care and let people judge us by what we look like, instead we need to feel happy about it!"
"What do you mean?" Sam asked.
"Well for example, when I was running this morning, I caught several people staring at my butt. But they're admiring it really; it's nothing to be embarrassed about!"
"You're right, I should be more careful about my weight, but until then I'll be happy around people as best I can!"
"I...guess I see what you mean." Clover said weakly, still recovering from her transient nudity in front of her friends. "This zit wasn't my fault, and I don't think it'll stop me from being fine in public."
"That's what I'm talking about! Now what do you say we do away with this rotten thing and go out to the mall?
"Sounds good to me!" Sam responded.
"Ummm...OK." Clover got up and picked out a new outfit; she went into her closet to put it on.
"Alright! Let's spend a few minutes getting ready and go!"
Sam made sure to remember to get a house key, Clover finished getting dressed and walked out to Sam's car after putting on shoes, and Alex changed, put the shrink ray back in its shipping box, and closed it before joining her friends. They drove off to enjoy their bodies on the outside and inside as well as they last day together prior to Clover's parents coming home.

She almost slammed her book down and whisper-shouted "What?!" to Clover, before noticing the inaudibly vibrating phone. She apologized to her before picking her phone up and answering it.

Clover, meanwhile, didn't hear the apology, as something about the vibration stimulated her. A sort of "tingly" feeling, but not one that made her feel uncomfortable. Rather the opposite actually, as it lingered and gave her a sense of pleasure, most concentrated in her nether regions. It's always fun to break some rules every once in a while, and I gotta admit being caught wouldn't be the worst thing in the world, especially cause I'm pretty now that that stupid zit is gone! And I'm 2 inches tall, how could I NOT get away with it?!" The attractive brunette chuckled and reached for her soft red cotton shirt to take it off too, when Sam looked over...

While Clover was going through the whole vibrating ordeal, Sam answered her phone. To her surprise, Alex was on the other end!
She spoke softly. "Hey Alex, finished early this morning?"
"Nah, not even close! In fact, I think I might've found out a way to have lots of fun running?"
"Huh? How? It's running. Running is exercise, and exercise is exhausting. How could you possibly make it FUN?!
"Well here's the deal. I ran my typical 3 miles this morning, and usually I catch a few guys staring at my butt, the norm. But today I swear I couldn't go a minute without seeing one trying to get a peek! And you know what? I love it!"

"My point is that there is none in trying to hide my butt or be pissed that boys wanna have a look! They're boys, it's what they do! So I've decided to go another 2 miles...without my shorts!"
Sam was in the middle of trying to rebuke Alex for doing something that was just crazy when she heard a hang up beep. "Cmon youre better than this im fat and i dont want anybody seeing that let alone colleges knowing about it"

Sam took some time to think it over. Calculus and Macroeconomics were really no joke to her, or anybody for that matter. She never really thought about it, but studying them took more of a toll on her mind than anything else. If she could ease that stress by shedding some clothes, then maybe it could help her get things done a little better.

Sam thought a little more about it, then looked around and realized just how lucky she and Clover were that during the entirety of their time at the library, nobody noticed a teenage girl with glasses and brown, curly hair seemingly talking down to her open purse, as if it were sentient and capable of talking back. Now underwear-clad Clover thought about it too, and called to Sam to tell her.

Abbie was Clover's real name. Back in freshman year, she started to have a random string of bad luck after passing an Algebra test that everyone else in her class failed. Jerry: Let me see, 1 cm? no they will still be able to see me, hmmm....1 millimeter? risky but its ideal.
He typed 1 millimeter and the machine was ready, he only aimed at himself.
Jerry: Yes now only to fire the beam, this is so cool since I'm retired.
He pushed the button and the beam fired towards him and hit his body.
Jerry was blinded when the beam hits him.

When he opened his eyes he realized it was already dawn.
Jerry: What happened? what...Oh it worked!
He realized he was the size of a tiny insect, incredibly small.
Jerry: This will be good, to the girls!

After some time he arrived upstairs in the hallway and saw the rooms of Clover, Sam and Alex.
Jerry: Which one should I spy on, at least, which one first?
14.title: Jerry the pervert

info.brief_description: The girls want themselves look perfect, however there is something not right.
info.description:
The Spies always wanna look perfect on school and everywhere else. But they have some problems with their body. Sam, clover and Alex receive a little machine that will make them look better. But they shall soon find out that it doesn,t matter how you look like or how you are. As soon as they activate the machine their world goes upside down.

Extra: Gary can also get shrunken in the girls house
